des:
You can use the MerryGLO Skill for Alexa to control your MerryGLO smart devices.

Before you can connect Alexa with MerryGLO smart devices, your need to follow these steps.
1. Download “MerryGLO” app from Google Play Store or Apple App Store.
2. Sign up or sign in with your MerryGLO account.
3. Setup the device with your “MerryGLO” app, and make sure you can control it in the app.
4. Open Alexa app, search “MerryGLO” skill and enable it by signing in your MerryGLO account.
5. After the setup is finished, you can control the device with Alexa.

MerryGLO devices compatible with Alexa: GLO, GLO LIGHT, GLO PRO, GLO MAX.

Connect your MerryGLO with the Alexa to control your devices with direct actions and voice commands. You can control MerryGLO devices(example: GLO is the name of the light in MerryGLO app) in your house by voice as following:
Alexa, turn on/off my GLO.
Alexa, set my GLO to red(bule/green/yellow….etc.).
Alexa, set my GLO to steady(sparkle/fade/twinkle….etc.).
Alexa, set brightness my GLO to Low(High)

Any problems, please contact us at merryglo2021@gmail.com
